property.name: Rules
property.value: Ċ: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. Ċ: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target artifact creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can break nothing I cannot mend."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bladehold houses a rogues' gallery filled with the living "statues" of the worst enemies of the Auriok.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metalcraft — Auriok Edgewright has double strike as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Auriok soldiers craft their own weapons, forging a connection to the steel with each blow of the hammer.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metalcraft — As long as you control three or more artifacts, Auriok Sunchaser gets +2/+2 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Grant me loft. Grant me light. Grant me the accuracy I need to kill all who threaten Bladehold."—Prayer to the Whitesun

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player sacrifices an attacking creature. Metalcraft — That player sacrifices two attacking creatures instead if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Accorders never strike first, but they always strike back.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +2: You gain 1 life for each creature you control. -2: Put three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens onto the battlefield. -5: Destroy all other permanents except for lands and tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two target creatures. Tap those creatures, then unattach all Equipment from them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Channeling the white-hot power of all five suns creates a pretty good diversion."—Yavash of the Accorders

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metalcraft — Ghalma's Warden gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A special unit guards the loxodon artificer known as Ghalma the Shaper. They are armed and armored in her finest works of silver and steel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Glimmerpoint Stag enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Glint Hawk enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an artifact you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its eyes burned nearly blind by the Whitesun, it hunts by metallic gleam.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Metalcraft — Artifacts you control have shroud as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every sword drawn to defend is an angelic blade, guided to justice by an angelic hand."—Auriok proverb

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a 2/2 white Cat creature token onto the battlefield for each Equipment attached to Kemba, Kha Regent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am not Raksha. I never will be. But I refuse to be the kha who watched her pride be torn asunder."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Kemba's Skyguard enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We're now to dispense aid to any Mirran we see battling anything . . . ‘strange.' Regent's orders."—Ranya, skyhunter captain

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players can't search libraries. Any player may pay 2 for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our people are torn by infighting. Until the two sides reconcile, our laws can carry no meaning."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Mirran elders vanished with Memnarch, leaving behind a generation of wayward orphans.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay 1. If you do, put a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Auriok see the artificer as a conduit, beckoning new creations into the world.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Razor Hippogriff enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand. You gain life equal to that card's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She incubates her eggs in gold and mana.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No half measures, no regrets. We'll tell no stories of this day. It will be as if it never existed at all."—Ganedor, loxodon mystic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ą, Sacrifice Salvage Scout: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm not saying it's dangerous work. I'm just saying don't sign up if you have plans for your seventieth birthday."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The time between spotting a leonin shikari and feeling its claws is just time enough to draw your last breath.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage one or two target creatures would deal this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I was called to this world of steel, and it will be my steel that answers."—Elspeth Tirel

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sunblast Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all tapped creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There may exist powers even greater than Phyrexia.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as Sunspear Shikari is equipped, it has first strike and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Left without their leader Raksha, the leonin split into two prides: one side supported the regent kha, while the other rebelled in fury.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death shall prevail as long as our will falls to rust. May necessity anneal our resolve."—Ghalma the Shaper

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have double strike and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dozens of spells known only to the Auriok elders were lost, but the next generation, galvanized by war, devised even more potent magic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control dies, you may pay X. If you do, you gain X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As she grew cold in my arms, I swore an oath that her funeral pyre would be dwarfed by a bonfire of our enemies."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All over the Razor Fields, Whitesun is celebrated. Even the followers of the rebel Juryan, far from the Cave of Light, bow their heads in reverence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Metalcraft — ą: Exile Argent Sphinx. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A great mirage, a dream of wings and silver.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sea's reach extends beyond its shores.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Darkslick Drake dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the edge of the Mephidross, Phyrexia's influence seeps into life and land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most casualties of the power struggle between vedalken and Neurok didn't die on the field of battle; they merely disappeared.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a permanent deals damage to you, return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Strike me once, shame on you. Strike me twice . . . Well, let's just see if you can."—Kara Vrist, Neurok agent

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other blue creatures you control get +1/+1. ą: Target artifact creature becomes blue until end of turn. Tap an untapped blue creature you control: Add 2 to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target artifact spell. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An artificer's least favorite mind-missive may be "I regret to inform you that the funding for your project has been cut."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "See how gratefully this world accepts our blessings."—Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Metalcraft — When Lumengrid Drake enters the battlefield, if you control three or more artifacts, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Properly outfitted, drakes made perfect sentries for vedalken strongholds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Neurok Invisimancer is unblockable. When Neurok Invisimancer enters the battlefield, target creature is unblockable this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They won't see your shadow or hear your breath, but they will feel your blade."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Neurok buried entangling cables just under the Quicksilver Sea. One seastrider harvest can provide an army's worth of armor and shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Quicksilver Gargantuan enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's still 7/7.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know you have achieved true power if the sea itself seeks to emulate your greatness."—Vy Covalt, Neurok agent

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Neurok see the artificer as an archaeologist, clearing away falsehoods to see the truth hidden beneath.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scrapdiver Serpent is unblockable as long as defending player controls an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Smart artificers clean up after themselves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Metalcraft — Whenever Screeching Silcaw deals combat damage to a player, if you control three or more artifacts, that player puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's adaptively deaf to its own cries.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The controller of target artifact sacrifices it, then reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals an artifact card. That player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles all other cards revealed this way into his or her library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sky-Eel School enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They swim on tides few can see, away from a threat few yet understand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "More of that strange oil . . . It's probably nothing."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metalcraft — Stoic Rebuttal costs 1 less to cast if you control three or more artifacts. Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Obsessed with the pursuit of knowledge above all else, vedalken can appear to be cold and emotionless.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Thrummingbird deals combat damage to a player, proliferate. (You choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of a kind already there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell that targets a permanent you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's not my job to ask our leaders about their experiments at the Knowledge Pool. It's my job to make sure they can continue performing them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "True strength is in the mind, for the body is too malleable a form."—Politus, vedalken emisar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Untap it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The edges of the Quicksilver Sea run dark with the spread of the Mephidross. Two more aerial passes before I can be sure what I'm seeing . . ."—Lafarius, Neurok sky agent

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metalcraft — Ċ: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. Activate this ability only if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An appropriately detailed model is indistinguishable from reality, and much easier to control."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant permanent When Volition Reins enters the battlefield, if enchanted permanent is tapped, untap it. You control enchanted permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Glorifying the will is a mistake. It is simply one more force to be mastered."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bitten? Save time, amputate now."—Lephar, loxodon surgeon

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metalcraft — When Bleak Coven Vampires enters the battlefield, if you control three or more artifacts, target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the shadow of the Mephidross spread over the Tangle, the vampires' territory expanded.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Swampwalk When Blistergrub dies, each opponent loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sooner you join Phyrexia, the sooner you'll forget your painful rebirth."—Sheoldred, Whispering One

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Carnifex Demon enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it. Ć, Remove a -1/-1 counter from Carnifex Demon: Put a -1/-1 counter on each other creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This species has grown to be my preferred receptacle for our divine message."—Sheoldred, Whispering One

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ć, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Corrupted Harvester.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before the blessed assault begins, we must seek specimens that are well-adapted to our way of . . . life."—Sheoldred, Whispering One

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Dross Hopper gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bred in the vicious Mephidross, dross hoppers learned to eat quickly and escape faster.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent loses X life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vampires don't consider patience a virtue nor gluttony a sin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast Flesh Allergy, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target creature. Its controller loses life equal to the number of creatures that died this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Fume Spitter: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our archers made sport of it as it fumbled its way up the slag ridge. As it collapsed we thought ourselves safe, but the foul thing carried more than necrogen."—Adaran, Tangle hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intimidate XĆ: Put target artifact or creature card with converted mana cost X from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control tapped. Then that player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On a world with five suns, night is compelled to become an aggressive force.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Other creatures you control with infect get +1/+1. Whenever you cast a creature spell with infect, target player gets a poison counter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) When Ichor Rats enters the battlefield, each player gets a poison counter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The results of our ninth inoculation were the same. The specimen was, of course, euthanized before the contagion could spread."—Vedalken research notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: Name a nonland card. Search target player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You claim wisdom, yet I see nothing in here but tawdry wishes."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Moriok are fools. They try so hard to gain my favor. All I want is for them to die quickly, to join the ranks of the nim."—Geth, Lord of the Vault

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Necrogen Scudder enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Contrary to popular belief, it's kept aloft by necrogen gas, not the screaming agony of a thousand murdered souls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as Necrotic Ooze is on the battlefield, it has all activated abilities of all creature cards in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To death all must go, and so in death lies ultimate power."—Geth, Lord of the Vault

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player loses 5 life unless he or she discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For each word spoken, one forgotten. For each thought, a memory rotten."—Moriok incantation

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may have target creature get +2/+0 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Moriok see the artificer as a taskmaster, forcing lazy metal into more potent shapes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It leaves its victims one sting closer to phyresis.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player discards a card. If a land card is discarded this way, return Psychic Miasma to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A mind may be steeled against madness, but all battlements fall in time."—Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact Whenever enchanted artifact becomes tapped, its controller gets a poison counter.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Until we shed the curse of sentience, we must endure its grotesque handiwork."—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Skinrender enters the battlefield, put three -1/-1 counters on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your creations are effective, Sheoldred, but we must unite the flesh, not merely flay it."—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) Ć: Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon gains haste until end of turn. ĆĆ: Regenerate Skithiryx.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains infect until end of turn. (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Arc Trail deals 2 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to another target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't try to hit your enemies. Concentrate on the space between them, and fill the air with doom."—Spear-Tribe teaching

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When breaking someone's face once just isn't enough.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ċ, Sacrifice an artifact: Barrage Ogre deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves had devised countless strategies to combat Memnarch's war machines, but they had no idea what to do when one was thrown at them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metalcraft — When Blade-Tribe Berserkers enters the battlefield, if you control three or more artifacts, Blade-Tribe Berserkers gets +3/+3 and gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ċ: Bloodshot Trainee deals 4 damage to target creature. Activate this ability only if Bloodshot Trainee's power is 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just think how strong I'll be if my arms don't tear off!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals the top card of his or her library. Cerebral Eruption deals damage equal to the revealed card's converted mana cost to that player and each creature he or she controls. If a land card is revealed this way, return Cerebral Eruption to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay 1. If you do, Embersmith deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Vulshok see the artificer as a catalyst, bringing the spark of creation that ignites change.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ć, Sacrifice an artifact: Ferrovore gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Vulshok use its digestion to break down the most obstinate metals, from darksteel myr to seastrider plates.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Flameborn Hellion attacks each turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The most reliable omen of a future hellion attack is a past hellion attack."—Spear-Tribe teaching

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you sacrifice another permanent, you may pay 2. If you do, Furnace Celebration deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Galvanic Blast deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Metalcraft — Galvanic Blast deals 4 damage to that creature or player instead if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirrodin has little weather, but it certainly has lightning.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Goblin Gaveleer gets +2/+0 for each Equipment attached to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When everything looks like a nail, you really need to get yourself a hammer."—Krol, goblin furnace-priest

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying 3ć: Destroy target artifact. Hoard-Smelter Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that artifact's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He collects the precious metals, and then converts the rest to propellant.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1: Untap target Mountain. It becomes a 4/4 red Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land. -2: Add ć to your mana pool for each Mountain you control. -5: You get an emblem with "Mountains you control have ‘Ċ: This land deals 1 damage to target creature or player.'"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste Metalcraft — 4: Return Kuldotha Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast Kuldotha Rebirth, sacrifice an artifact. Put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All goblin rituals serve a dual purpose as fertility rites, even the destructive ones. Especially the destructive ones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land. Melt Terrain deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just as the most finely wrought metal can warp and rust, so too does Mirrodin buckle under pressures from without and within.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player shuffles the cards from his or her hand into his or her library, then draws that many cards. Metalcraft — If you control three or more artifacts, Molten Psyche deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of cards that player has drawn this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Ogre Geargrabber attacks, gain control of target Equipment an opponent controls until end of turn. Attach it to Ogre Geargrabber. When you lose control of that Equipment, unattach it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice an artifact: Oxidda Daredevil gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His goggles spattered with grime and his mouth full of bugs, he tossed the engines another priceless relic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Oxidda Scrapmelter enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It subsists on a diet rich in screaming metal and molten blood.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A single molten cord links it to the subterranean furnaces, drawing heat and metal from beneath Kuldotha. Until that bond is cut, it carves a swath of raw destruction.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am an artist, a builder, a creator . . . I create the biggest explosions around."—Krol, goblin furnace-priest

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1ćć: Spikeshot Elder deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Now that he knows a thousand ways of hurting people, his next shamanic quest is to discover a thousand more.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, if that player had another land enter the battlefield under his or her control this turn, Tunnel Ignus deals 3 damage to that player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Turn to Slag deals 5 damage to target creature. Destroy all Equipment attached to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it wasn't a blackened, stinking, melted abomination before, it certainly is now."—Koth of the Hammer

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Vulshok Heartstoker enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He fashions stirring words with as much passion as a smith fashioning a warhammer.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach When Acid Web Spider enters the battlefield, you may destroy target Equipment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its web is an excellent source of found copper for the daring or the stupid.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hunger seized the tyrranax, and the Sylvok's vision quest ended in disaster.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.) 1Ĉ: Regenerate target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let my ignominy build walls thicker than iron and stronger than darksteel."—Thrun, the last troll

property.name: Rules
property.value: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Other green creatures you control have intimidate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) 1Ĉ: Regenerate Blight Mamba.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its venom drips with Phyrexia's hate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You gain 1 life for each creature on the battlefield. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Much can be gained from the appearance of vulnerability."—Ezuri, renegade leader

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metalcraft — Carapace Forger gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bows and whips cannot save us from these new horrors of the Mephidross."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put two 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with infect onto the battlefield. (They deal damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The natural order is out of order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Copperhorn Scout attacks, untap each other creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fangren spur may sound louder, but Viridian resurgents claim that the horn of the vorrac creates a truer, more inspiring note.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phyrexia strives to simulate natural life, but it can't resist improving on the design.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Engulfing Slagwurm blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its teeth exist only for decoration.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ĉ: Regenerate another target Elf. 2ĈĈĈ: Elf creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The infamous Ezuri commands the highest bounty the vedalken have ever placed upon an outlaw.

property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Ezuri's Archers blocks a creature with flying, Ezuri's Archers gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Riding ravenous, ever-growing vorracs is almost as dangerous as fitting them with saddles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put any number of permanent cards with converted mana cost X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then put all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Liege of the Tangle deals combat damage to a player, you may choose any number of target lands you control and put an awakening counter on each of them. Each of those lands is an 8/8 green Elemental creature for as long as it has an awakening counter on it. They're still lands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, you may pay 1. If you do, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Sylvok see the artificer as a gardener, preparing the world for hardy growth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Molder Beast gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.value: "A trail of scrap metal can lead it into an ambush. But take care not to overfeed it."—Adaran, Tangle hunter

property.value: Target creature gains protection from artifacts until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.value: The Viridian elves had purged their culture of the trolls' traitorous influence. In times of strife, however, the ancestral memories returned.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from artifacts Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

property.value: "No longer am I shackled to antiquity. My new masters will etch a glorious future."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn.

property.value: "Beasts kill for their very survival. If you would have their strength, you must know their desperation."—Konnos, Sylvok sage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an artifact is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor

property.value: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I were the air, I wouldn't taunt the ground. It has the weight advantage."—Konnos, Sylvok sage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature is indestructible this turn. (Lethal damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less, it's still put into its owner's graveyard.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Mirrodin, every conflict ends in either death or darksteel.

property.value: +2: Exile target permanent you own. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step. -1: Creatures are unblockable this turn. -8: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, exile target permanent."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the loyalty of the Auriok with only a trace of their self-righteousness.

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has flying and first strike. Equip 2

Each copy targets a different one of those Golems.
